editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Dryer, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Washer
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Recreation room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: Brand New Construction and Full Gut Rehab - No Expense Spared in Desirable Portage Park. Blend of modern and craftsman style with unique exterior vinyl siding design. Entire house is spray foamed, solid-core custom doors and designer finishes throughout. Beautiful lawn, ready for the swing set! Kohler ensemble for all bathrooms. Master bedroom with huge WIC, ready for your built-in designs! New custom windows and skylights in the master and 2nd floor bath. Bamboo floors for 1st and 2nd floor, tile in the basement. Kitchen has 42" solid espresso cabinets, Ivory Fantasy granite counter tops and SS appliance package. Ample storage, separate laundry room, new concrete poured parking pad and sidewalk along with a brand new iron sliding gate. Overhead sewer, drain tile w/ sump pump. You will not be disappointed, must see in person! New electrical, plumbing, HVAC, too many things to mention! Coming soon! All work permitted from the City of Chicago.
response.whatOwnerLoves: This home has all the features a family needs, a turn-key property. There are 4 bedrooms above grade, 3 bathrooms in total and very low utility bills. See it to believe it!
